model.name: Nexus REST VOs
model.description: Nexus Value Objects used in REST API

class.name: AuthenticationSettings
class.description: Remote authentication tokens used in remote authentications against HTTP Proxies and/or protected remote repositories.

field.name: username
field.description: A username to be used in authentication.

field.name: password
field.description: A password to be used in authentication.

field.name: ntlmHost
field.description: The Windows NT Lan Manager to use for authentication.

field.name: ntlmDomain
field.description: The Windows NT Lan Manager Domain to use for authentication.

class.name: RemoteConnectionSettings
class.description: The connections settings defines common connection properties, like retries count and timeouts.

class.name: SmtpSettings
class.description: The connections settings for an smtp server.

class.name: RemoteHttpProxySettings
class.description: The HTTP Proxy defines proxies used to access the internet.

class.name: GlobalConfigurationListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a global configuration list request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is a list of the global configuration items requested.

field.name: data
field.description: List of global configuration items.

class.name: GlobalConfigurationListResource
class.description: An item that contains details about a global configuration item, including the url required to retrieve the configuration details.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: The url that can be GET requested to retrieve the details of the global configuration.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the global configuration.

class.name: GlobalConfigurationResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a global configuration request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the global configuration item requested.

field.name: data
field.description: The global configuration details.

class.name: GlobalConfigurationResource
class.description: List of all global configuration items in Nexus.

field.name: securityEnabled
field.description: Flag that determines if security is enabled, if false, there will be no authc/authz checks performed on any requests to the systme.

field.name: securityAnonymousAccessEnabled
field.description: Flag that, if true, will allow anonymous access while security is enabled.

field.name: securityAnonymousUsername
field.description: The username to use for anonymous access (so that roles/privileges can be applied to the anonymous access users).

field.name: securityAnonymousPassword
field.description: The password to use for anonymous access.

field.name: securityRealms
field.description: List of security realms that are enabled for Nexus, note that order IS important.

field.name: globalConnectionSettings
field.description: Global remote connection settings.

field.name: smtpSettings
field.description: SMTP settings for email notifications that Nexus generates.

field.name: globalHttpProxySettings
field.description: Global HTTP Proxy Settings (will be applied to all repositories by default).

field.name: globalRestApiSettings
field.description: Rest API configuration parameters.

field.name: errorReportingSettings
field.description: Error reporting configuration parameters.

class.name: ErrorReportingSettings
class.description: Connection parameters to allow Nexus to report errors to the Sonatype JIRA server.

field.name: jiraUsername
field.description: Username of a valid jira account (if empty will use the default error reporting username).

field.name: jiraPassword
field.description: Password of a valid jira account (if empty will use the default error reporting password).

field.name: useGlobalProxy
field.description: Flag that states whether to use the global proxy configuration in Nexus.

class.name: ContentListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a content resource request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is a list of the content items requested.

field.name: data
field.description: List of ContentListResource objects, each of which represents a single item in the repository.

class.name: ContentListResource
class.description: A Content Item definition, including all data needed to properly access the item, and understand the item.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: The URI that can be used to directly access this item in the future.

field.name: relativePath
field.description: The relative path in relation to the root of the repository.

field.name: text
field.description: A name of the content item.

field.name: leaf
field.description: Flag that states whether the content item is a file item (if true), otherwise it is a folder item, and can use the resourceURI to retrieve the contained content.

field.name: lastModified
field.description: Timestamp the item was last modified.

field.name: sizeOnDisk
field.description: Size of the item on the disk.

class.name: ContentListDescribeResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a content resource request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is a list of the content items requested.

field.name: data
field.description: List of describe items, that will contain useful information about the retrieved data.

class.name: ContentListDescribeResource
class.description: Details about the requested item, that should be useful in finding how the item was retrieved.

field.name: requestUrl
field.description: The original request url used to access the resource.

field.name: processingTimeMillis
field.description: The number of milliseconds that passed while retrieving the item.

field.name: request
field.description: A set of request parameters for the item.

field.name: response
field.description: A set of response parameters for the item.

class.name: ContentListDescribeRequestResource
class.description: A set of request parameters that were used to retrieve the item.

field.name: requestUrl
field.description: The request url that initially generated this request.

field.name: requestPath
field.description: The path on the server that was requested.

field.name: requestContext
field.description: A list of String objects that were in the Restlet request context.

class.name: ContentListDescribeResponseResource
class.description: A set of response parameters that were sent back with response.

field.name: responseType
field.description: States the type of item that was returned (or NONE if not found).

field.name: responseActualClass
field.description: The classname of the returned item.

field.name: responsePath
field.description: The path of the item in the repository.

field.name: responseUid
field.description: A string that uniquely defines this item in the system (or 'virtual' if this is an item from a virtual repository).

field.name: originatingRepositoryId
field.description: The id of the repository this item was retrieved from (or null if this is an item from a virtual repository).

field.name: originatingRepositoryName
field.description: The name of the repository this item was retrieved from (or null if this is an item from a virtual repository).

field.name: originatingRepositoryMainFacet
field.description: The main facet (Repository implementation) of the repository this item was retrieved from (or null if this is an item from a virtual repository).

field.name: processedRepositoriesList
field.description: List of repositories that were processed while retrieving this item (in case item was retrieved via a group url, for example, would list all repositories in the group scanned until item was found).

field.name: appliedMappings
field.description: List of mappings applied while retrieving this item.

field.name: properties
field.description: List of extra properties containing more information.

field.name: attributes
field.description: List of attributes stored on disk for the item.

field.name: sources
field.description: If this is a composite item, the list of sources that this item was generated from.

class.name: LogsListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a log list resource request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is a list of the log items requested.

field.name: data
field.description: List of Log file items.

class.name: LogsListResource
class.description: Details to retrieve a log file from the Nexus server.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: The url that can be GET requested to retrieve the log file content.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the file.

field.name: size
field.description: The size of the file.

field.name: mimeType
field.description: MIME type of the file.

class.name: ConfigurationsListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a list of Nexus configuration objects, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is a list of the configuration items.

field.name: data
field.description: List of Nexus configuration objects.

class.name: ConfigurationsListResource
class.description: A Nexus configuration item, and the url needed to retrieve the configuration details.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: The url that can be accessed to retrieve details about the configuration.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the configuration item.

class.name: FeedListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a list of Nexus feed items, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is a list of the feed items.

field.name: data
field.description: List of feeds available from Nexus.

class.name: FeedListResource
class.description: Details about an RSS Feed that Nexus supplies.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: The URL that must be used to retrieve the feed data.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the feed.

class.name: LogConfigResource
class.description: Set of parameters that describe how logging is configured

field.name: rootLoggerLevel
field.description: The root logger level (i.e. DEBUG, INFO, etc.).

field.name: rootLoggerAppenders
field.description: The appenders that the root logger will use.

field.name: fileAppenderLocation
field.description: Where the file will be stored.

field.name: fileAppenderPattern
field.description: The pattern used to write to the file.

class.name: LogConfigResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for the log config request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the log configuration.

field.name: data
field.description: The log configuration parameters.

class.name: ErrorReportRequestDTO
class.description: Details required to generate an error report.

field.name: title
field.description: The title of the error report.

field.name: description
field.description: A detailed explanation of the error report.

class.name: ErrorReportRequest
class.description: REST Request object for generating an error report, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is an error report item.

field.name: data
field.description: The error report object.

class.name: ErrorReportResponseDTO
class.description: The response data that is returned after generating an error report.

field.name: jiraUrl
field.description: The JIRA server URL for the error report that was created.

class.name: ErrorReportResponse
class.description: REST Response object received after generating an error report, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the error report response item.

field.name: data
field.description: The error report response object.

class.name: ArtifactResolveResource
class.description: A resource which contains full maven details of the requested artifact.

field.name: groupId
field.description: The groupId of the requested artifact.

field.name: artifactId
field.description: The artifactId of the requested artifact.

field.name: version
field.description: The version of the requested artifact.

field.name: baseVersion
field.description: The base version of the requested artifact.

field.name: classifier
field.description: The classifier of the requested artifact.

field.name: extension
field.description: The file extension of the requested artifact.

field.name: snapshot
field.description: Flag that states if requested artifact is a snapshot.

field.name: snapshotBuildNumber
field.description: The build number of the snapshot version of the requested artifact.

field.name: snapshotTimeStamp
field.description: The timestamp portion of the snapshot version of the requested artifact.

field.name: fileName
field.description: The filename of the requested artifact.

field.name: sha1
field.description: The sha1 hash of the requested artifact.

field.name: repositoryPath
field.description: The path in the repository of the requested artifact.

class.name: ArtifactResolveResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object received after requesting an artifact resolve, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the artifact resolve details.

field.name: data
field.description: The artifact details requested.

class.name: ArtifactCoordinate
class.description: Uniquely identifies a maven artifact. This is returned by the artifact upload request.

field.name: groupId
field.description: The group id of the artifact.

field.name: artifactId
field.description: The artifact id of the artifact.

field.name: version
field.description: The version of the artifact.

field.name: packaging
field.description: The packaging type of the artifact.
